Name: The Epicurean
Ingredients: 50 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: The combination of rum, lime, absinthe and basil works well - herbaceous and fresh. The finished cocktail comprises a mere 70ml-ish of liquid.
History: French Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail winning cocktail by Matthieu Henry, Le Comptior De La Bourse, Lyon.
